scripts.publish: settlemint scs hardhat script local --script scripts/hardhat/main.ts
scripts.deploy:remote: settlemint scs hardhat deploy remote --deployment-id asset-tokenization
scripts.deploy:local: settlemint scs hardhat deploy local -m ignition/modules/main.ts --deployment-id asset-tokenization-local --reset
scripts.deploy:local:onboarding: settlemint scs hardhat deploy local -m ignition/modules/onboarding.ts --deployment-id asset-tokenization-local --reset
scripts.predeploy:local:test: bun compile:hardhat && bun codegen:types && rm -Rf ignition/deployments/atk-local
scripts.deploy:local:test: settlemint scs hardhat script local --script scripts/hardhat/main.ts
